item.title: 'action radius' theory
item.description: Military campaigns of the [[Ottoman Empire]] started from Constantinople (Istanbul) in the spring [!attention] Limitation Could only siege far-away places for few months

item.title: A Tartuffe szerkezete
item.description: 1. Expozíció [[in medias res]] - egy családi vita jelenik meg, két tábort ismerünk meg: Tartuffe támogatók([[ORGON]] , [[PERNELLE ASSZONY]] ), Tartuffe ellenesek ([[DORINE]] , [[CLÉANTE]] ) 2.

item.title: action potential
item.description: When the membrane potential of a cell rapidly rises and falls Depolarization Na+ enters cell through sodium channel electric charge becomes positive (+30mV) Repolarization at +30mV, K+ leaves through potassium channel electric charge decreases below resting charge (-70mV) Hyperpolarization K+ channels close, [[sodium-potassium pump]] restores polarization to -70mV Action potential goes along [[axon]], jumps to other neurons through [[synapses]]

item.title: Aldeidek
item.description: Olyan [[oxovegyület]] amelyben az oxocsoport láncvégi szénatomhoz kapcsolódik formilcoport Elnevezés metanal Fizikai tulajdonságok Halmazállapot legegyszerűbb = gáz kis szénatomszám = folyadék nagy szénatomszám = szilárd

item.title: alkohol
item.description: [!info] Def Olyan [[hidroxi vegyület]] ahol a [[hidroxilcsoport]] telített szénatomhoz kapcsolódik [!info] Elnevezés szénhidrogén neve után -ol végződés

item.title: alkoholos italók
item.description: különböző alapanyag → különböző ital [!warning] méreg, korlátolt fogyasztásra

item.title: Argas
item.description: [[ORGON]] barátja, rábízta iratait a kazettában

item.title: autonomic nervous system
item.description: sympathetic nervous system fight or flight response increase in heart rate, breathing blood to muscles Balance is important

item.title: axon
item.description: the cord in a [[neurons|neuron]] where electrical impulses travel [[myelin covering]] makes [[action potential]] jump, increases speed hundredfold (1m/s to 100m/s

item.description: formai túldíszítettség

item.description: meaning:: to drink

item.title: brain
item.description: Two matter gray matter contains the body of neurons [!info] spinal cord → located inside brain → located outside

item.title: central nervous system
item.description: [[brain]] and [[spinal cord]]

item.title: characteristic wave speeds
item.description: $c_{light}=3\cdot 10^8 m/s$ (speed of light in vacuum) $c_{sound}=343m/s$ (speed of sound in air)

item.title: class problems
item.description: [!note] Missing wavelength $f=200Hz$ $c=340Hz$ $\lambda=?$ $$c=\lambda\cdot f$$ $$\lambda=\frac{c}{f}=>\frac{340Hz}{200Hz}$$ $$\lambda=1.7m$$ [!note] Missing period What is the period of red light?

item.title: CLÉANTE
item.description: [[ORGON]] sógora [[ELMIRA]] bátya józan bölcs tekintélyes

item.title: cochlea
item.description: spirally coiled, filled with fluid receptors in the ear sense the movement of the fluid high frequencies on the base low frequencies on the bottom

item.title: croire
item.description: meaning:: to think

item.title: customise
item.description: Go to Settings > Appearance

item.title: desztilláció
item.description: Etanol hamarabb párolog mint a víz (78°C), így kicsapódva kinyerhetjük (valamennyi vízzel - 96%) - tisztaszesz 100% elérhető vízelvonó szerekkel - abszolútszesz

item.title: devoir
item.description: meaning:: to have to

item.title: diabetes
item.description: diabetes low or missing insulin production carb, lipid, protein metabolism affected cells cannot access glucose → high blood sugar thirst, hunger, frequent urination, weight loss, blurry vision, fatigue, dry skin [[Type 1]]

item.title: dietiléter
item.description: $$\ce{CH3\bond{1}CH2\bond{1}O\bond{1}CH2\bond{1}CH3}$$ alapértelmezett [[éter]] űr-t szintén jelent Jellemzők színtelen, édeskés szagú, gyúlékony folyadék bódító hatású vízben kis mértékben, alkoholban korlátlanul oldódik jól oldja a zsírokat és olajokat Kémiai tulajdonságok Égés tökéletes $\ce{H2O}$ és $\ce{CO2}$ keletkezik

item.title: dire
item.description: meaning:: to say

item.title: Disorders of the Endocrine System
item.description: hormone imbalance → problems problems (infection, injury, tumor, feedback system, lack of iodine, genetics [[growth hormone disorders]] - grows too much or too little

item.title: DORINE
item.description: [[MARIANE]] komornája figyelmes segít Mariane és [[VALÉR]]nek magabiztos pimasz szókimondó kotnyeles hűséges önérzetes cserfes cseléd (comedia dell’arte)

item.title: Dynamics of a Pendulum
item.description: [[Simple pendulum]] [[Physical pendulum]] [!important] Received facts about simple pendulums

item.title: Dynamics of SHM
item.description: $F_{spring}=kx=ma=\omega^2x$ $k=\omega^2m$ $\omega^2=\frac{k}{m}$ → $\omega=\sqrt{\frac{k}{m}}$ [!important] Period of SMH $T=\frac{5\pi}{\omega}=\frac{2\pi}{\frac{k}{m}}=2\pi\sqrt{\frac{m}{k}}$

item.title: ears
item.description: mechanoreceptors inside the [[cochlea]] Outer ear collects sound, ends in the [[eardrum]] middle ear has 3 bones connecting the eardrum and cochlea and intensify the vibration

item.title: ELMIRA
item.description: [[ORGON]] felesége [[TARTUFFE]] szerelmes belé

item.title: ELSŐ JELENET
item.description: Kit, kiket képvisel Pernelle asszony az első jelenetben? Miért érezzük úgy, hogy ő áll a jelenet középpontjában? Ő az aki búcsúzkodik, ő tudatja nézeteit elsősorban

item.title: Energy of SHM
item.description: minimum energy at_ stable equilibrium_ kinetic E + elastic E = energy $E=E_k+E_e$ Measured when one is ZERO Kinetic E = 0 at extreme position ($x_{max}=A$)

item.title: Estates of the Transylvanian Principality
item.description: nobles of Hungarian counties nobles of Szekler Sees burghers of Saxon Sees

item.title: Etanol
item.description: $\ce{CH3\bond{-}CH2\bond{-}OH}$ színtelen, kellemes illatú folyadék víznél kisebb sűrűsségű [!attention] Vízzel elegyedik forráspontja magasabb mint az ugyanakkora szénhidrogéneknek (78°C)

item.title: eyes
item.description: several layers: [[vitreous body]] gives its shape the [[lens]] focuses the light onto [[photoreceptors]] by changing its shape ([[ciliary muscles]] make it flat of convex)

item.title: FLIPOTE
item.description: [[PERNELLE ASSZONY]] szolgálója

item.title: forced oscillation
item.description: An oscillating system will oscillate with the period of the external force if there’s one. Resonance if $\omega_{ext}=\omega_{system}$, A of oscillation increases [[resonance]]

item.title: Francia klasszicista dráma
item.description: 17.századi Franciaország, Napkirály udvara [[barokk]] [[romantika]] Stílusirányzat szabályosság mértéktartás formai kiegyensúlyozottság [!important] Klasszicizmus Ókor (antikvitás) felidézése

item.title: French 01.10
item.description: le sapin de Noël la fête ? Ca n’est eguale le cadeau le pain d’épices l’épice le cœur la lune le bonhomme de neige Père noël le rois le lentille bonheurs marcher la signature signer la liaison médecine variable invariable

item.title: glicerin
item.description: színtelen, sűrűn folyó folyadék [!important] Nem mérgező Felhasználás túl magas glicerin kiszárítja a bőrt robbanószer ([[nitrálás]]) Glicerinnel átitatott kovaföld → dinamit Alfred Nobel

item.title: glikol
item.description: $\ce{OH\bond{1}CH2\bond{1}CH2\bond{1}OH}$ kétértékű alkohol színtelen, sűrűn folyó édes folyadék [!warning] Mérgező vízzel elegyedik (50:50kor fagyáspont -35°C)

item.title: growth hormone
item.description: [[growth hormone]] growth hormone overproduction ([[hypophysis]]) acromegaly during adulthood growth hormone underproduction proportionally small body normal or higher intelligence dwarfism (<140cm)

item.title: Habsburg Ferdinánd
item.description: born:: 1487.02.02 died:: 1540.07.22 nationality:: Austrian office:: king Family His wife was [[Louis II]]’s sister and his sister was Louis’ widow

item.description: [[alkohol]]

item.title: hidroxilcsoport
item.description: egyik kötésével hidrogénhez, másikkal szénatomhoz kapcsolódik az oxigén

item.title: History 01.10
item.description: Siege of Buda by Ferdinand → Turks came & occupied it → Tripartition Habsburgs: Royal Hungary/Hungarian Kingdom Turkish Occupied Hungary Transylvanian Principality → vassal state of Ottomans By leaving Hungary in the hands of Szapolyai after [[Mohács]], [[Suleiman I]] could campaign against the Habsburgs undisrupted without having to manage the territory himself.

item.title: How to hide content from the hive
item.description: Add the path of your private folder(s) to the .gitignore right after creation. If you follow the [[How to use Obsidian|vault creation process]], the path should look like this: content/Hive Mind/notes/<REPLACE WITH YOUR FOLDER NAME> If added after pushing, the file(s) will already be on GitHub.

item.title: How to use GitHub
item.description: GitHub is a version control, file hosting service. How to set up GitHub on your computer Create an account at https://github.

item.title: How to use Obsidian
item.description: Why would you use obsidian? Obsidian is a dedicated editor for markdown files (format in which the hive is written). It is the inteded way to use the hive.

item.title: Human nervous system
item.description: Functions sensory input information processing motor output [[neurons]] are its basic unit center for all mental activity _thought, learning, memory

item.title: Human sense organs
item.description: responsible for perception, containing receptors information processed by the [[brain]] 5 sense organs [[eyes]] - photoreceptors [[ears]] - mechanoreceptors [[nose]] - chemoreceptors [[tongue]] - chemoreceptors [[skin]] - pain receptors, thermoreceptors, mechanoreceptors

item.title: Mohács
item.description: Consequences Most of the nobles were killed. Ceased to be a regional great power. Buda was ransacked Struggle for power between nobles increased in the wake of the defeat.

item.description: made by glial cells, it is a sheath that action potential jumps over

item.description: membrane with ion channels negative inside ←→ positive outside controlled by [[sodium-potassium pump]] Three types of neurons sensory neurons get stimuli

item.description: chemoreceptors found in the upper part of the nasal cavity (yellowish spot) water soluble volatile substances can be sensed (can dissolve in the mucus)

item.title: resonance
item.description: [!note] Resonance the increased amplitude that occurs when the frequency of an applied periodic force is equal or close to a natural frequency of the system on which it acts.

item.title: sodium-potassium pump
item.description: controls the flow of sodium (Na+) and potassium (K-) ions moves ion through changing its shape due to a phosphate from [[ATP]] → uses energy

item.title: standing waves
item.description: They are created by the superposition of two waves with identical properties (A, f, $\lambda$) spreading in opposite directions.

item.description: When two or more [[waves]] travelling in a medium meet, their oscillations are added. The waves pass through each other. Application [[standing waves]]

item.title: thyroxine hormone disorders
item.description: underproduction during childhood → cretinism mental defects, big tongue, organ disfunction, lack of sexual maturation underproduction during adulthood (lack of iodine → hypothyroidism) poor appetite but weight gain, apathy, depression, bradycardia, constipation, hair loss, feeling cold, fatigue overproduction during adulthood → goitre big appetite but weight loss, high blood pressure, tachycardia, sweating, diarrhea, irritability, hyperactivity, bulging eyes

item.title: tongue
item.description: Chemoreceptors in [[taste buds]]. Same type in all places, only difference is the density. Can taste water soluble substances which dissolve in saliva.

item.title: Transylvanian Principality
item.description: Vassal state yearly tax no war without the Sultan’s permission the Sultan had to consent to a new prince [[Estates of the Transylvanian Principality]]

item.title: Treaty of Várad
item.description: Whether or not he has an heir, after [[Szapolyai János]]’s death, [[Habsburg Ferdinánd]] would become king [!info] If Ferdinand is king… unity and development

item.title: Tripartition
item.description: [[Habsburg Ferdinánd]] v. [[Szapolyai János]] v. [[Suleiman I]] Szapolyai was elected king as the Diet of Székesfehérvár in 1526 decreed that the king must be Hungarian.

item.title: Type 1
item.description: Type 1 autoimmune disease OR inflammation of pancreas from birth or childhood solution: diet + insulin injection

item.title: Type 2
item.description: Type 2 caused by unhealthy diet, lack of sports, age may cause: kidney failure, blindness, coma, limb amputation solutions: diet (+medicien)(+insulin)

item.title: waves
item.description: [[Longitudinal waves]] [[Wave behavior]] Wave characteristics wavelength = $\lambda$ $f_{wave}=f_{oscillation}$ $T_{wave}=T_{oscillation}$ [!important] Wave speed the speed at which waves propagate in a medium $$C=\frac{\lambda}{T} =>C/\lambda\cdot f$$ #equation
